episodes.title: Police Car Challenge
episodes.plot: The boys are trying to solve the fuel crisis since fuel prices gone up. Jeremy reviews the new Ferrari 430 Scuderia. Top Gear Stuntman is introduced. The boys build their own police cars for less than a 1000 pounds.

episodes.title: Audi RS6 vs French Skiers Race - TG Stuntman: MG Maestro Cork-Screw Jump
episodes.plot: The return of the "Cool Wall". Richard road tests the new Audi RS6 and has a race against two skiers. Jeremy road tests the new Mercedes CLK63 AMG Black Edition. Top Gear Stunt man attempts to do a barrel roll stunt. Jeremy road tests two of the worlds most popular road-going rally cars, the new Mitsubishi Lancer Evolution X and the new Subaru Impreza WRX Sti.

episodes.title: Cheap Car Challenge: Alfa Romeos for £1,000
episodes.plot: An attempt to prove to their producers that you cannot be a true petrol head until you buy an Alfa Romeo, the boys are each given 1000 pounds to buy one. Jeremy tests the new Bentley Brooklands.

episodes.title: Nissan GT-R vs Japanese Bullet Train Epic Race
episodes.plot: It will be another epic race across Japan. James and Richard, traveling on the most reliable public transport in the world, against Jeremy, in the new Nissan GT-R (the super car that set the fastest time around the Nürburgring). Jeremy test the new Alfa Romeo 8C.

episodes.title: Classic Luxury Limousines - Daihatsu Terios Fox Hunting Challenge
episodes.plot: Jeremy tests the Nissan GT-R again, but this time on the race track as he had only scratched the surface of what this super car was capable of the last time he drove it. Since car magazines had feature ads that contained old, but classic, cars (worth the same as a Ford Mondeo), Jeremy and James are out to prove that you can buy old classic cars for "Mondeo money", should you consider paying the huge service bill. Jeremy and Richard are on a fox hunt, Top Gear style. Richard will be the hunter while Jeremy will drive a Daihatsu Terios which was painted to looked like a...

episodes.title: The British (Top Gear) vs. The Germans (D Motor) Showdown
episodes.plot: James road tests cars from Japanese car maker, Mitsuoka. Richard tests the ugliest but fastest supercar, the Gumpert Apollo. The boys went head-to-head with the hosts of the German version of Top Gear.
